Now publishing the content makes it available to everybody, who is interested in such content and accessible through global search.  Publishing is super easy. Just send valuable content to publish@emmares.net  and after evaluation, the content will be available globally. The service is free and accessing new interested readers was never so easy. Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO][EMA] EMMARES | 🚀 Email as you know it, will never be the same 🚀

Social profiling makes results personalized to the interests of the users.  The platform is based on BIG DATA technology and incorporates reputation scores as one of the primary SEO factors.  Everybody can publish the Email content by sending it to publish-publishername@emmares.net  where publishername is the name of the content provider. Publishing is free and creates content in the content search directory. Everybody, who is looking for such type of content can see it.  Sending spam to that directory is not a good idea as it will result in entering such sender and the content to the banned sender list, which will be available to all anti-spam providers.  Legitimate content will be in the directory without the reputation score. Content creators can open an account at the EMMARES portal and get the rating footer for their next campaigns. Rating footer creates a reputation score, which is based on the evaluation scores and brings a better position in the search results. Every publisher can decide to give certain benefits to participants of the evaluators and on such way incentivize participation.

Author: inforocker
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO][EMA] EMMARES | 🚀 Email as you know it, will never be the same 🚀
Body: That is exactly what EMMARES is changing.. In  the past the only way of "advertising" on the email sphere was "pushing" the information to as many usually uninterested customers. That is exact definition of spam and also the reason, we all hate deleting spam every day. EMMARES is bringing new perspective in email marketing. Let us assume, that we have good and legal content provider, whose content is valuable to some targeted groups and others, who are just junk. Believe or not, there are also customers, who want information on Casinos or similar content, which is by the most of us unappreciated. Reputation directory will offer exactly the reputation score for various types of information and will help to reach information, which is valuable for us and from the area, which is of our interest.  It will help users to make opt in to the best providers from certain area and to make easy opt out from those, who failed to meet their criteria. EMMARES does NOT send any content by itself and does NOT share any email info. But EMMARES builds transparent and trusted content reputation directory and based on that directory services, which helps recipients and marketers to connect.  Thank you for the question. We believe, that this is exactly the point of success for EMMARES eco system.  To be a little more descriptive :  Recipient receives email from his usual airline company, to which he opted in some time ago. He is interested in special fares. As the airline decides to provide EMMARES rewarding pool, he will receive a footer, where he rates the content of that mail. As he is impressed by the offer, he gives 5* to the email content. Evaluation is received by the EMMARES system, written in the side chain and remains unchangeable, and the airline is getting good reputation score. On the EMMARE recipient portal there is a page with top lists of content reputation scores for providers by the content type. Is any other user clicks on airlines, he will see that particular airline in the directory with good score and he will be able to opt in for that information, as also that user would like to get good airfare offers.  So easy searchable content system with reputation scores to help to choose good or the best providers for the area, which is in  the interest of that interested recipient.   Latter in  the glottalization stage, when amount of rated providers will be big enough, an API is planned for anti spam systems, which will filter out all unrated emails, which are type of mass mailing. On such way, everybody will be able to reduce the spam amount drastically and participate in  the health of whole email eco system with rating content providers and on such way earn rewards from EMMARES rating system.

Author: TajaO
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO][EMA] EMMARES | 🚀 Email as you know it, will never be the same 🚀
Body: Hello,  I suggest to maybe watch our video which explains the idea behind EMMARES well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=3&v=Zd9EqxFX6M0 The idea is not only to send email, reduce spam and improve security although they are all components of the whole EMMARES process. The system enables receivers (everyday users) to pick their favorite topics and choose what kind of content they want to receive. It also includes them in the evaluation process since they have the ability to rate the senders (they rate each mail they receive). In return, they get EMA tokens from a rewarding pool that is provided by email sender (marketers). And this is where the blockchain technology steps in. Email marketers build up their reputation and ensure they have big enough rewarding pool in order to get enough ratings to be rated as one of the top senders. That way they can access targeted groups of their interest which in the end brings better email marketing results and higher ROI.  Blockchain technology is essential in this project since everyone can check the unchangeability (trust) of the assessments. Also, Blockchain is a main transfer of value (reward) between the pool and a recipient. As Ethereum blockchain has limited throughput and a high cost for small transactions, we use side chain with high throughput, which is referenced to main blockchain (ethereum) in a way, that block-hash off side chain is reflected on the main blockchain, ensuring trust and unchangeability of the scores. Personal data is off-chain for obvious reasons.  I hope I made it clear for you but if you have any more questions feel free to ask.
